Class Graphics2DFramebuffer

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.map.framebuffers.Graphics2DFramebuffer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Framebuffer
public class Graphics2DFramebuffer extends Object implements Framebuffer
Framebuffer that embeds a BufferedImage, allowing for rendering directly via Graphics2D or its pixel array.
